data.prayer: Spirit, help the 29,675 believers find a person of peace today among the 790,925 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sjælland, Denmark
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 29,675 believers in Sjælland, Denmark a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 70 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sjælland, Denmark.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, teach the 29,675 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Sjælland, Denmark so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. Make the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 820,600 people living in Sjælland through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Sjælland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sjælland, Denmark has a population of 820,600.

We estimate Sjælland has 29,675 people who might know Jesus, 639,553 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 151,372 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sjælland, Denmark.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
